statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY M1.SortOrder, M2.SortOrder, AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.GoodsID , AA.ImageType , AA.ImageGroup , AA.ImageUrl
, M1.Name as ImageTypeName , M2.Name as ImageGroupName
FROM dbo.TGoodsImage AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ImageType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'ImageType' LEFT JOIN dbo.TCode M2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ImageGroup = M2.Code AND M2.ParentCode = 'ImageGroup' WHERE AA.GoodsID = #GoodsID# ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.GoodsID , AA.ImageType , AA.ImageGroup , AA.ImageUrl
FROM dbo.TGoodsImage AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TGoodsImage ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, GoodsID, ImageType, ImageGroup, ImageUrl ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #GoodsID#, #ImageType#, #ImageGroup#, #ImageUrl# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TGoodsImage SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, GoodsID = #GoodsID# , ImageType = #ImageType# , ImageGroup = #ImageGroup# , ImageUrl = #ImageUrl# WHERE ID = #ID#
